data.title: Pocket Camp link question
data.meta_description: For Animal Crossing: New Horizons on the Nintendo Switch, a GameFAQs message board topic titled "Pocket Camp link question".
data.text:
Curse 4 years ago#2

I deleted my ACNH save and started over in a new island and the Pocket Camp items were available from Nook Terminal from the start. You don't need to link again.

brentoni 4 years ago#3

The Pocket Camp promo just gives a code to unlock dlc that lets you buy certain items in game. Once you use that code your account has that dlc regardless of whether you delete your save.
